Set.Text: Forms a [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connection with the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital over water (if they are not already [ICON_CONNECTED] connected by land). Sea trade routes originating from this city have a 50% increase in range and produce an additional 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold when connecting to another civilization. Water tiles produce +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be built on the coast.
